# Linux Shell Basics

This chapter demonstrates a few essential shell commands used in Linux/Unix environments.

## File and directory operations

```{bash}
# Print current directory
pwd

# List files with details
ls -la

# Create directories and files
mkdir -p project/data
echo "id,name" > project/data/sample.csv
echo "1,Alice" >> project/data/sample.csv
echo "2,Bob" >> project/data/sample.csv

# View file contents
cat project/data/sample.csv
